introduction: Student, Full Stack Developer, Web App Cybersecurity Enthusiast

about.line1: I'm Abdelmadjid, a student and full stack developer with a passion for web app cybersecurity.
about.line2: I love exploring new technologies, programming and learning new things!
about.line3: Feel free to connect with me on my social media platforms or check out my projects on GitHub!

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Ready to bring your ideas to reality ?

competences.1: Built and maintained scalable web applications using Vue 3 and Firebase (Firestore, Auth, Cloud Functions)
competences.2: Developed backend logic and APIs with Firebase Functions and handled real-time data syncing with Firestore
competences.3: Designed responsive UIs and component-based architecture for seamless user experience
competences.4: Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions with Firebase Hosting for automated deployments
competences.5: Collaborated with remote teams in an Agile/Scrum environment to deliver iterative product updates
competences.6: Ensured application security, performance, and scalability to support business growth

competences.1: Assisted in maintaining and deploying production applications in a Linux-based environment
competences.2: Built automation scripts and internal tools to streamline routine IT and support tasks
competences.3: Worked with Docker to containerize and manage application environments
competences.4: Monitored and supported application performance in production environments

competences.1: Provided first-line IT support for internal employees, troubleshooting hardware and software issues
competences.2: Managed service requests and incidents via ticketing system, ensuring timely resolution
competences.3: Collaborated with senior IT staff to escalate complex technical problems
competences.4: Supported Windows environments using Active Directory for user account management and SCCM for software deployment and workstation maintenance
